title: The Disney channel. -Volume 5.
brief_description: Features 2 hours of entertainment from the Disney channel. Included in this volume: GOOD MORNING MICKEY: “Symphony hour; WELCOME TO POOH CORNER: “Eeyore’s costume party”; directed by Philip F. Messina, based on the books by A. A. Milne and illustrated by Ernest H. Shepard. Narrated by Laurie Mann: MOUSE FACTORY: “Home owners”; produced and directed by Ward Kimball and featuring Jim Backus as Mickey’s friend: DONALD DUCK PRESENTS: “Magic and music” plus “Peter and the wolf”; directed by Clyde Geronimi and told by Stirling Holloway: MOUSERCISE; produced by George Taweel, directed by Gordon Myers and featuring Kellyn, Donald, Goofy and friends. There are tracking problems at the beginning of this segment.
